channel.title: 718 run.bat problem
channel.description:
hey, I just tried setting up a 718 I had on another computer, only difference is the new computer is windows 8 not 7 (windows 8 is terrible) and I get an error when I try running the server that I'd never gotten on w7.
here's my run.bat [code]@echo off title Running Citellum RSPS java -Xms512m -Xmx512m -cp bin;data/libs/* com.rs.Launcher false false true pause[/code]
this is the error. [code]Error: could not pen 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\lib\amd64\jvm.cfg' Press any key to continue...[/code]
I assume it's cause of the change to windows 8? Does anyone know what the problem might be?

item.title: 718 run.bat problem
item.dc:creator: @Fear1408 Fear1408
item.description:
@Fear1408 wrote:

hey, I just tried setting up a 718 I had on another computer, only difference is the new computer is windows 8 not 7 (windows 8 is terrible) and I get an error when I try running the server that I’d never gotten on w7.

here’s my run.bat

@echo off title Running Citellum RSPS java -Xms512m -Xmx512m -cp bin;data/libs/* com.rs.Launcher false false true pause

this is the error.

Error: could not pen 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\lib\amd64\jvm.cfg' Press any key to continue...

I assume it’s cause of the change to windows 8? Does anyone know what the problem might be?
